atten3.ptxt: If reusing the evaporator, do not insert the sensor at a location where the sensor was previously inserted. Insert the sensor within range C shown in the illustration.

s2.ptxt: Insert the No. 1 cooler thermistor (front evaporator temperature sensor) as shown in the illustration to install it.
Sufficiently apply compressor oil to 2 new O-rings and the fitting surface of the hose joint.
Install the 2 O-rings to the cooler evaporator.
Using a 4 mm socket hexagon wrench, install the cooler expansion valve with the 2 hexagon bolts.
Attach the clamp to install the No. 1 cooler evaporator sub-assembly.
Attach the 3 claws to install the lower heater case.
Attach the evaporator case to the blower case.
Install the heater radiator unit sub-assembly with the screw.

s-1.ptxt: INSTALL HEATER CONTROL CABLE SUB-ASSEMBLY (for Manual Air Conditioning System)

s2.ptxt: Attach the 3 claws to install the heater control cable sub-assembly.

s-1.ptxt: INSTALL AIR MIX DAMPER CONTROL CABLE SUB-ASSEMBLY (for Manual Air Conditioning System)

s2.ptxt: Attach the 3 claws to install the air mix damper control cable sub-assembly.

s-1.ptxt: INSTALL MODE DAMPER SERVO SUB-ASSEMBLY (for Automatic Air Conditioning System)

s2.ptxt: Install the mode damper servo sub-assembly with 3 screws.
Set the mode damper servo sub-assembly so that the tooth of the gear engages with the cutout part as shown in the illustration to install the lever.
Attach the claw to install the lever.

s-1.ptxt: INSTALL AIR MIX DAMPER SERVO SUB-ASSEMBLY (for Automatic Air Conditioning System)

s2.ptxt: Install the air mix damper servo sub-assembly with the 3 screws.
Install the blower assembly with the 3 screws.

s-1.ptxt: INSTALL AIR CONDITIONING AMPLIFIER ASSEMBLY (for Manual Air Conditioning System)

s2.ptxt: Install the air conditioning amplifier assembly with the screw.
